mapper.select: SELECT id, department_id, name, function, contact, address, info, state, update_time, create_time FROM f_f_department WHERE state = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, department_id, name, function, contact, address, info, state, update_time, create_time FROM f_f_department WHERE state = 1 LIMIT #{from}, #{to}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_f_department (id, department_id, name, function, contact, address, info, state, update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{departmentId}, #{name}, #{function}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{info}, #{state}, NOW(), NOW())
